definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: Agency officials say the country's weak drug laws are compounding the problem.
sentences.chinese: 該機構官員說，該國薄弱的禁毒法使問題複雜化。

sentences.english: Able to reveal weaknesses in the structure in order to optimize the structure design.
sentences.chinese: 能夠揭示出結構的薄弱環節，以利於優化結構設計。

sentences.english: Hardness was quiet different in different zone of fusion welding joint.
sentences.chinese: 熔焊接頭硬度分佈不均勻，熱影響區是薄弱環節。

sentences.english: She was underdressed for the hiking trip and suffered hypothermia.
sentences.chinese: 她徒步旅行時穿得有些薄弱，因此以爲渾身發冷。

sentences.english: Defence has always been weak and vulnerable in the basket-ball matches in China.
sentences.chinese: 防守是我國籃球隊的一個薄弱環節。

sentences.english: They leapfrogged the enemy's main force and struck at his weak points.
sentences.chinese: 他們避開敵人主力而打擊其薄弱點。

sentences.english: In the study of modern Chinese, lexicology is a comparatively under-researched field.
sentences.chinese: 在現代漢語研究中，詞彙領域的研究相對比較薄弱。

sentences.english: Poor and outdated management decisions have caused problem.
sentences.chinese: 薄弱及過時的管理決策許多問題。

sentences.english: A chain is no stronger than its weakest link. -(Conan Doyle)
sentences.chinese: 一條鐵鏈的堅固程度取決於它最薄弱的一個環節。

sentences.english: River channels indicate a weak point in the crust, a point where pulling apart is most likely to happen.
sentences.chinese: 河道指明瞭地殼的薄弱點，那裏最可能發生撕裂。

sentences.english: How to practise evidence-based medicine(EBM) in clinic still remains a problem.
sentences.chinese: 循證臨牀實踐是當前循證醫學教育的一個薄弱環節。

sentences.english: Elasmobranch study is weak comparatively in China.
sentences.chinese: 我國對板鰓魚類的研究比較薄弱。

sentences.english: The history of mathematics in Pre-Qin China is the weakest domain in the study of the history of mathematics in China.
sentences.chinese: 先秦數學史一直是中國數學史研究的薄弱環節。

sentences.english: Our troops are already bursting through the enemy's weakened defences.
sentences.chinese: 我們的部人正在突破敵人防線中薄弱的環節。

sentences.english: Laos boasts nonferrous mineral resources, but is weak in development technology.
sentences.chinese: 老撾有色金屬礦源豐富，但開發技術等方面力量薄弱。

sentences.english: The basic techniques concerned with passing, taking a pass and dribbling are the weakness in the real games.
sentences.chinese: 傳接球和運球基本技術在實戰運用中是薄弱環節。

definition: to be deficient in sth/to be short of sth (supplies, money etc)
short stave of the barrel (which allows the contents to escape)/(fig.) shortcoming/weak point
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than
range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
faultless/complete/perfect/to leave nothing to be desired
